   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Sep 19 18:23:19 2016.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Templated YAML's documentation!
==========================================

This module combines YAML documents hierarchically.  It's used to simplify situtaions where you have several
different configuration files that share a common base.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   usage/index
